mapper.select: SELECT pi.prod_img_savename, p.prod_name, cs.prod_size, cs.color, p.prod_price, c.count, c.cart_no, c.user_no, p.prod_no, cs.colorsize_no FROM cart c, product p, colorsize cs, prodimg pi WHERE c.prod_no = p.prod_no and c.colorsize_no = cs.colorsize_no and p.prod_no = pi.prod_no and pi.prod_img_type = 'main' and c.user_no = #{user_no}
SELECT user_no, user_name From users WHERE user_no = #{user_no}
SELECT sum(p.prod_price*c.count) FROM cart c, product p WHERE c.prod_no = p.prod_no and user_no = #{user_no}
